channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Delete All Comments Easily
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Delete All Comments Easily

item.title: CVE-2020-36505|2024-08-04T17:30:08.049Z -- unknown -- delete%20all%20comments%20easily
item.description: The Delete All Comments Easily WordPress plugin through 1.3 is lacking Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) checks, which could result in an unauthenticated attacker making a logged in admin delete all comments from the blog.
